core.controller.virtualrepresentations

Class VirtualRepresentationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.controller.virtualrepresentations.VirtualRepresentationManager

  • public class VirtualRepresentationManager
extends Object
    This class is responsible for managing interactions with all virtual representations. Incoming CRUD-Operations on uris are sent to this manager and exceuted by him
    Author:
    Jan-Peter.Schmidt

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Individual domain of user
      static String NS_VR
      Domain of the framework, used for defining own predicates for rdf graphs.
      static String nsPrefixCustom
      Prefix of NS_VR namespace
      static String TEMP_PATH
      Path where temp file can be stored

      • VirtualRepresentationManager

    • Method Detail

      • getRepresentation

        public static VirtualRepresentation getRepresentation(String name)
        Function that returns a representation by its name. The name is everything that is in uri after /representations
        Parameters:
        name - name of representation. Name is part of the uri afte /representations
        Returns:
        Instance of virtual representation with supplied name

      • register

        public static void register(VirtualRepresentation representation,
                            String name)
        Function to register virtual representation. Registration is mandatory for newly created virtual representations.
        Parameters:
        representation - Instance of VirtualRepresentaion that should be registered
        name - Name of representation under which it is stored.

      • deregister

        public static void deregister(String name)
        Function to deregister virtual representation. This is automatically done after deletion
        Parameters:
        name - Name of representation that should be deregistered

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(String name)
        Function to check if a representation exists
        Parameters:
        name - Name of representation to check
        Returns:
        true if registry of manager contains representation with supplied name, else false

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(VirtualRepresentation representation)
        Function to check if a representation exists
        Parameters:
        representation - instance of representation to check
        Returns:
        true if registry of manager contains supplied instance, else false

      • getParentFromURI

        public static VirtualRepresentation getParentFromURI(String name)
        This functions derives a parent from an uri. This is done by path splitting.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of representation for that the parent will be derivced
        Returns:
        Instance of parent representation, if one is found. Else null.

      • getRegisteredRepresentations

        public static HashMap<String,VirtualRepresentation> getRegisteredRepresentations()

      • checkName

        public static String checkName(String name)
        Checks if the name of the representation is valid. If so it returns the name. It also appends an / if missing at the end of the uri.
        Parameters:
        name - name to be checked.
        Returns:
        null if an error occured. Else the name.

      • isVariable

        public static VirtualRepresentation isVariable(String name)
        Checks if a supplied name is a variable or a representation
        Parameters:
        name - Name of possible variable
        Returns:
        Instance of virtualRepresentation if name is not a variable, else null

      • create

        public static int create(String name)
        Creates a new representation by name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of new representation
        Returns:
        0: if an error occured (500); 1: VirtualRepresentation created, no content added (204); 2: VirtualRepresentation created, content added (201)

      • create

        public static int create(String avaName,
                         File file)
        Creates an representation Instance and calls VirtualRepresentation.update() with file.
        Parameters:
        avaName - Name of the representation (part of URI)
        file - File that contains functions or model.
        Returns:
        0: if an error occured (500); 1: VirtualRepresentation created, no content added (204); 2: VirtualRepresentation created, content added (201)

      • read

        public static ReadResponse read(String name,
                                String accept)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of virtual representation that should be read.
        accept - accepted media type.
        Returns:
        -1: VirtualRepresentation not found (404), 0 any other error (500), 1 on success (representation), 2 on success (variable).

      • update

        public static int update(String name,
                         File file)
        Updates the representation instance for @see(avaName) with information in @see(file)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of representation
        file - File that contains model.
        Returns:
        -2: if VirtualRepresentation was not found (404); -1: if File is null (204); 0: if any other error occured (500); 1: if update was successful (200).

      • delete

        public static int delete(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of representation to delete.
        Returns:
        -1: VirtualRepresentation not found (404), 0 on any other error (500 1 on success (200)

      • getDomain

        public static String getDomain()

      • setDomain

        public static void setDomain(String domain)
